about_the_game:
Become Specter 1 of the Specter Squadron and suppress the rebellion in Lidolfi.


About the Game:

This game is a simple third-person 3D flight shooting arcade game.
Control the aircraft (MF-100) to destroy enemy ground weapons and aircraft, and complete the missions.


How to Start the Game:

Pressing the mission button on the menu screen allows players to read the mission description.
Pressing Start on the mission description screen starts the mission.


Game Features:

A 3D third-person flight shooting game.
During missions, players control an aircraft to destroy enemy weapons.
Enemy weapons include aircraft and ground-based weapons.
The story progresses through conversation dialogues at the top of the screen during missions.
The player's aircraft is armed with missiles and machine guns. (There is one mission where multi-rocket launchers are added.)
Players cannot select or upgrade their aircraft. These are determined automatically.
Mission progress is automatically saved. When a mission is completed, the button for the next mission description is displayed.
There is no score or score-saving feature.


Controls:

ESC: Pause the game
Mouse: Control the aircraft
Moving the mouse horizontally rotates the aircraft.
Moving the mouse downward ascends the aircraft.
Moving the mouse upward descends the aircraft.
A, D: Move the aircraft left or right (important)
W: Speed up
Right-click: Change weapons
Left-click: Fire weapons
Pressing the ESC key on the menu screen displays the options menu.

Partial Xbox controller support
Select button: A, Left stick(in menu screen)
Move: Right stick, Left stick
Use weapon: LB, A
Change weapon: RB, B
The functionality has been confirmed, but it is not officially supported.
In-game pause is not supported.

Please use both the mouse and keyboard to control the aircraft.
Mouse inversion and sensitivity cannot be changed from the options.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10,11(64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Dual-Core or AMD Dual-Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1050ti,AMD Radeon RX560
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4400 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: The base game and all DLCs require 9GB of storage for installation.

  • OS: Windows 10,11(64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 (7th) or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 1060 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4400 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: The base game and all DLCs require 9GB of storage for installation.
